General.Name: Abdullah Saad Mohammed Abo Moati Stationeries Co
General.Description: Abdullah Saad Mohammed Abo Moati for Bookstores Company engages in the retail and wholesale trading of stationary, computers, and other accessories in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company retails and wholesales prints, stationaries, school and office supplies, and computer supplies, education aids, gifts and wrapping products, paper supplies, children's toys, and cosmetics and cosmetic soaps, as well as books, magazines, newspapers, and computers and their accessories. It also engages in the retail of mobile phone accessories, household appliances and handicrafts, cutting tools, ceramic, glassware, and pottery; clothing accessories, including gloves, ties, bras, suspenders, prayer beads, and umbrellas; medical devices, equipment, and supplies; games, antiques, pharmaceutical goods; and men's and women's ready-made clothes. In addition, the company is involved in wholesale of textiles and fabrics, plastic materials, rubber and industrial fibers, luxuries, art and drawing, paper rolls, art tools, and teaching aids. Further, the company engages in selling of printers and inks, as well as owns and operates bookstores, general stores, and various retail outlets. Additionally, the company invests in, constructs, manages, sells, and leases residential and non-residential properties. Abdullah Saad Mohammed Abo Moati for Bookstores Company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
